snippet: Tom Hanks has engaged Yahoo to be the first digital distributor for “Electric City,” an animated science-fiction series that he created and that he is producing and starring in.
abstract: Tom Hanks engages Yahoo to be the first digital distributor for Electric City, an animated science-fiction series that he created and is producing and starring in.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Tom Hanks has engaged Yahoo to be the first digital distributor for “Electric City,” an animated science-fiction series that he created and that he is producing and starring in.

headline.main: Yahoo to Distribute Tom Hanks Series
headline.print_headline: Yahoo to Distribute Tom Hanks Series
